availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Scott County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Jemima S. Burbridge in Scott County on February 15, 1841. Father of Thornton B. Sinclair and Jemima E. Sinclair. Married to Mary P. Hord Sinclair in Mason County in July 1848. Father of Jesse S. Sinclair, Ahord B. H. Sinclair, Mary P. Sinclair, and Eugene Sinclair. Farmer in Scott County in 1850. Owned thirty-two enslaved persons in Scott County in 1850. Farmer in Scott County in 1860. Owned forty-one enslaved persons in Scott County in 1860.
